reviewText: This was supposed to be a Christmas gift for my son. But since it's been over a month and you still can't even locate the movie to send it to me and I have found it else where I will be canceling my order and getting my money back. I tried to give this a half a star for effort but it won't let me, you got lucky and got a full one. Thanks,

This isn't what I thought I was buying, but when I started watching it I'm sure some people will get into it.  It's not the COPS we're used to seeing on TV today, it's the made up version is all.  But not bad especially for the price.

I was fooled! I thought this had something to do with the COPS TV show. Not at all.

This is a set of not "B" movies but "C" movies from the 50's and 60's. Totally unknown actors and movies which have something to do with investigation or police (as 80% of movies often have).

It is a discrase to even sell this sh**t!!
